subject: Golf
Books and Literature
lead_paragraph: “Homer Kelley’s Golfing Machine: The Curious Quest That Solved Golf” is an engaging story of a simple but complex man obsessed with the simplicities and complexities of golf.
snippet: “Homer Kelley’s Golfing Machine: The Curious Quest That Solved Golf” is an engaging story of a simple but complex man obsessed with the simplicities and complexities of golf.
